description:
From our law office in Mahwah, New Jersey, the dedicated legal professionals at Simon Sarver Attorneys at Law are ready to assist you with protecting your rights and interests. We strive to obtain the favorable outcomes you seek for your serious and pressing legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury arising from motor vehicle accidents, slip-and-fall accidents and other preventable tragedies
  • Workers' compensation
  • Criminal defense for all types of felonies and misdemeanors
  • DUI defense
  • Traffic violations defense

Originally established in 1936, our law firm has grown to include three offices across New Jersey, making us one of our region's premier full-service legal practices for individuals and families in need. Although we have undergone many changes over the years, one thing that has never changed is our commitment to providing quality, effective legal counsel, advocacy and support to our clients.

Today, attorney Gregory M. Jachts leads our practice, and he has more than 25 years of legal experience to help you make the best-informed decisions and improve the likelihood you will achieve the favorable outcome you expect and deserve as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible. Over the course of our history, we have recovered tens of millions of dollars in compensation for our plaintiff clients while securing numerous acquittals, dismissals and reductions of charges for the accused.

To discuss your issues at no cost, you can contact Simon Sarver Attorneys at Law to schedule a free initial consultation. Our law office also offers virtual consultations and video strategy sessions to help keep you safe and healthy in today's uncertain environment.
